member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA
member.summary: Describes the properties of a file that is being copied by means of the clipboard during a Microsoft ActiveX drag-and-drop operation.

summary.para: An array of flags that indicate which of the other structure members contain valid data. This member can be a combination of the following values.
0x00000001. The clsid member is valid.
0x00000002. The sizel and pointl members are valid.
0x00000004. The dwFileAttributes member is valid.
0x00000008. The ftCreationTime member is valid.
0x00000010. The ftLastAccessTime member is valid.
0x00000020. The ftLastWriteTime member is valid.
0x00000040. The nFileSizeHigh and nFileSizeLow members are valid.
0x00004000. A progress indicator is shown with drag-and-drop operations.
0x00008000. Treat the operation as a shortcut.
(int)0x80000000. Windows Vista and later. The descriptor is Unicode.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.clsid
member.summary: The file type identifier.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.sizel
member.summary: The width and height of the file icon.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.pointl
member.summary: The screen coordinates of the file object.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.dwFileAttributes
member.summary: File attribute flags. This will be a combination of the FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ values described in .

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.ftCreationTime
member.summary: The structure that contains the time of file creation.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.ftLastAccessTime
member.summary: The structure that contains the time that the file was last accessed.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.ftLastWriteTime
member.summary: The structure that contains the time of the last write operation.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.nFileSizeHigh
member.summary: The high-order DWORD of the file size, in bytes.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.nFileSizeLow
member.summary: The low-order DWORD of the file size, in bytes.

member.name: FILEDESCRIPTORA.cFileName
member.summary: The null-terminated string that contains the name of the file.
